name: Fröggo
description:
Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 47!

Help little Fröggo reach his friends on the other side of the river. Try not to suffer any unforseen consequences!

For best experience, play in full screen!

CONTROLS:
WASD to move, Space for contextual actions.

CHANGELOG:

v1.1 - Fixes enemy shadows not displaying correctly.
